data.TRO1_text:

20XX to 20YY.

Projects: 
Coding Pirates (nominee, Spilprisen 2017), License To Recruit (Winner)
data.TRO2_text:

data.Campaign1_text:
Difficulty: Training

6 years @ RUC uni 
Learned about human nature, social behavior and how to work together with other humans. 

Bosses slain:
Bachelor Thesis ([url][color=green]medium[/color]), Master Thesis (hard)
data.Campaign2_text:
Difficulty: Beginner

6 months @ Metroselskabet I/S 
Handled company mobile assets and did workflow optimizations.  

Bosses slain: 
Newcomer Angst (easy), First Job (easy), Real Responsibility (medium)
data.Campaign3_text:
Difficulty: Hard

8 years @ Serious Games Interactive 
Leading 40+ game development projects. Cross class role focusing mostly on project leading and ownership. 

Bosses slain: 
Demanding Customers (hard), Unrealistic Expectations (medium), Too Small Budgets (medium), Unmotivated Team (hard)
